en.hero.subtitle: Aarogya Mitra connects you with healthcare services in your preferred language, making healthcare accessible for everyone.

en.features.reports.desc: Securely store and access your medical reports and documents

en.features.helpdesk.desc: Quick access to emergency services and nearest healthcare facilities

en.appointments.title: Book Appointment
en.appointments.subtitle: Find and schedule appointments with healthcare providers
en.appointments.selectDoctorSubtitle: Choose a doctor from the list to book an appointment
en.booking.success: Your appointment has been successfully booked.
en.chat.welcome: Hello! I'm your multilingual health assistant. I can help you with health questions, symptoms, and medical guidance in {{language}}. How can I assist you today?
en.chat.responses.consultProfessional: I understand your concern. Based on what you've described, I'd recommend consulting with a healthcare professional for a proper evaluation.
en.chat.responses.monitorSymptoms: Thank you for sharing that information. For symptoms like these, it's important to monitor them closely and seek medical attention if they worsen.
en.chat.responses.notReplaceAdvice: I can help you understand this better. However, please remember that I cannot replace professional medical advice.
en.chat.responses.proactive: That's a great question about your health. In {{language}}, I'd say it's always best to be proactive about your wellbeing.
en.chat.responses.findProviders: I'm here to support you with health information. Would you like me to help you find healthcare providers in your area?
en.chat.recording.sampleText: I have been feeling tired lately and have some headaches. Can you help me understand what might be causing this?
en.chat.recording.label: Recording... Speak now
en.chat.header.title: Health Assistant
en.chat.header.subtitle: Multilingual AI Support
en.chat.disclaimer: AI assistant can make mistakes. Please consult healthcare professionals for medical advice.
en.emergency.title: Emergency Services
en.emergency.subtitle: Immediate assistance and nearby healthcare facilities
en.emergency.activatedMsgBody: Help is on the way. Stay calm and wait for assistance.
en.emergency.contacts.title: Emergency Contacts
en.emergency.facilities.title: Nearby Facilities
en.emergency.safetyTips.title: Emergency Safety Tips
en.emergency.safetyTips.before.title: Before Emergency Services Arrive:
en.emergency.safetyTips.before.tip2: Apply pressure to any bleeding wounds
en.emergency.safetyTips.before.tip3: Keep the person comfortable and warm
en.emergency.safetyTips.before.tip4: Do not move someone with suspected spinal injury
en.emergency.safetyTips.info.title: Important Information to Provide:
en.emergency.safetyTips.info.tip4: Any known medical conditions or allergies
en.signup.createAccountSubtitle: Join thousands of users for better healthcare
en.signup.termsIntro: Welcome to Aarogya Mitra! By creating an account, you agree to the following:
en.signup.termsEligibility: You must be at least 18 years old or have parental/guardian consent to use our services.
en.signup.termsResponsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login details. Any activity under your account will be your responsibility.
en.signup.termsUse: Our platform is meant for healthcare-related information and communication. You agree not to misuse the platform for unlawful or harmful purposes.
en.signup.termsAccuracy: You must provide accurate information during signup and keep it updated.
en.signup.termsChanges: Aarogya Mitra may update or modify its services at any time without prior notice.
en.signup.termsTermination: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms.
en.signup.termsLiability: While we strive for accuracy, Aarogya Mitra does not guarantee that all content is free from errors or omissions.
en.signup.termsConclusion: By clicking "Create Account", you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms and Conditions.
en.signup.privacyIntro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how Aarogya Mitra handles your personal information:
en.signup.privacyCollect: Name, email, phone number, preferred language, and account details. Usage data such as login times, device type, and interaction with the platform.
en.signup.privacyUse: To create and manage your account, personalize your healthcare experience, and send important updates or alerts.
en.signup.privacyShare: We do not sell your personal data. Information is only shared with trusted service providers for platform functionality or when required by law.
en.signup.privacySecurity: We use encryption and secure storage to protect your data. However, no online system is 100% secure.
en.signup.privacyRights: You can request to update, download, or delete your account information anytime by contacting us.
en.signup.privacyUpdates: We may update this Privacy Policy. Continued use of our services means you accept the updated terms.
en.signup.privacyContact: For questions, contact us at medimitra@gmail.com
